channel.title: What do you guys do for fun?
channel.description:
Just wondering what else you guys do besides coding, programming, RSPS, etc.
Me personally, I enjoy playing Guitar, football,chilling with my friends, and going to the gym.

punk, anti-folk, celtic punk, folk punk, psychobilly, ska punk, crust punk, anarcho punk, hardcore punk, skate punk, heavy metal, black metal, death metal, power metal, speed metal, stoner metal, thrash metal, grindcore, sludge metal, ska (all waves), and rocksteady

I’m probably missing some, but that’s atleast most of it[/quote]

Your a punk

item.title: What do you guys do for fun?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:80, topic:364388”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=460603.msg3373389#msg3373389 date=1287415921]

I do wood carving and whittling. It’s quite relaxing. Building something out of nothing is a really rewarding experience.
[/quote]I do then when camping, it is fun. But you’re not really building something out of nothing.

Well technically you’re not building something out of “nothing”

But I mean taking a block of wood, and turning it into a useable object. I used my first pocketknife to make my first whittling knife, which I now use all the time.[/quote]
crafting lvl?
lets see… i just go on my server, play basketball, watch tv, watch some hockey, some more basketball… yeah…

Read full topic

item.title: What do you guys do for fun?
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

Well on a Friday night i like to look at my computer for notifications moparisthebest.com, after that chore is done i will head into the bathroom whip out my lvl 29 serpent snake and attack it for about 30 mins until it gives me the good stuff. 0.0

Hahahahaha Jk man

Well i like to try to act like i know how to java script, I like to hang with my girlfriend while walking in the park trail. I like to cook which is pretty odd for a guy. I also like to work at my job at subway.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you guys do for fun?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:80, topic:364388”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=460603.msg3373389#msg3373389 date=1287415921]

I do wood carving and whittling. It’s quite relaxing. Building something out of nothing is a really rewarding experience.
[/quote]I do then when camping, it is fun. But you’re not really building something out of nothing.

Well technically you’re not building something out of “nothing”

But I mean taking a block of wood, and turning it into a useable object. I used my first pocketknife to make my first whittling knife, which I now use all the time.[/quote]Crafting then, not creating

But anyway, back on topic.

[quote=“jme, post:79, topic:364388”]no pro yet
http://yfrog.com/j8suzygapin21ftz[/quote]I’ve only 4-wheeled once, and it was one of the best days of my life

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“jmood128, post:56, topic:364388”]Lets see…

Tanoth
Evony
Runescape
Moparscape
R-S
Powerbot
botting
PSN
watch t.v
watch porn
watch some more porn
jack off to porn
watch t.v
eat a devil dog

You know the usual, this is most of what I do everyday. :)[/quote]
